results.name: wordpress-app/wordpress

error.Text: Service has not ready endpoints, pods: [Pod/wordpress-5445bc4985-q6g55], expected 1

results.details:
Error: The service has no ready endpoints because the pod 'wordpress-5445bc4985-q6g55' is not ready, but 1 is expected.

Solution: 1. Check pod status with `kubectl get pods`. 2. Inspect pod details using `kubectl describe pod wordpress-5445bc4985-q6g55`. 3. Look for readiness probe issues or errors. 4. Fix any configuration or resource issues. 5. Restart the pod if needed.

results.name: wordpress-app/wordpress-5445bc4985-q6g55

error.Text: Readiness probe failed: HTTP probe failed with statuscode: 500

results.details:
Error: The readiness probe failed because the application returned a 500 status code, indicating an internal server error.

Solution: 
1. Check application logs for errors.
2. Ensure all dependencies are running.
3. Verify configuration settings.
4. Restart the application.
